name: biomni-check-drug-combination-safety
title: Biomni: Check Drug Combination Safety
description: Checks safety of drug combinations by analyzing potential interactions
content:
Overview

Checks safety of drug combinations by analyzing potential drug-drug interactions, contraindications, and synergistic adverse effects. Provides comprehensive risk assessment for polypharmacy scenarios with mechanism-based insights.

Input Parameters

  • drug_list (required): List of drug names to evaluate for combination safety
  • include_mechanisms (optional): Include interaction mechanisms in report (default: True)
  • include_management (optional): Include clinical management recommendations (default: True)
  • data_lake_path (optional): Path to custom drug interaction database

Input Format

{
  "drug_list": ["Warfarin", "Aspirin", "Clopidogrel"],
  "include_mechanisms": true,
  "include_management": true,
  "data_lake_path": "/path/to/database"
}

Biological Use Case

Critical for clinical decision support in patients on multiple medications. Prevents adverse drug events, optimizes therapeutic regimens, and ensures safe prescribing practices. Especially important in elderly patients and those with multiple comorbidities requiring polypharmacy.

Output

Safety assessment report with interaction severity ratings, mechanism explanations, clinical significance, and management recommendations saved to drug_combination_safety_results.txt

Category

pharmacology
